original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Naphtali was Ahira the son of Enan.
korean_text: 납달리 자손 지파의 군대는 에난의 아들 아히라가 이끌었더라

sentences.original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Naphtali
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 납달리 지파 백성의 군대 위에는

sentences.original_text: was Ahira the son of Enan.
